markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Coyote Cloak](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3071)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 287 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This dusty cloak is made of mangy brown-and-gray coyote fur. You gain a +1 item bonus to Survival checks. If you critically succeed at your Survival check to Subsist, you can feed twice as many additional creatures.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Coyote Cloak
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 287 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 609 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Coyote Cloak (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 609 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 650 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The cloak grants a +2 item bonus, and if you critically succeed at a Survival check to Subsist, you can feed four times as many additional creatures.
name: Coyote Cloak
